ascatter 0.0.1.9000
  • Reference

Attach dependency

dependency.Rd

Attach scatter plot dependency.

as_dependency()

d3_dependency()

as_full_dependency()

Note

The package also depends on d3.

Examples

aframer::a_scene(
  aframer::a_sky(),
  list(
    d3_dependency(),
    as_dependency()
  )
)
#> <a-scene>
#>   <a-sky></a-sky>
#> </a-scene>

# OR
aframer::a_scene(
  aframer::a_sky(),
  as_full_dependency()
)
#> <a-scene>
#>   <a-sky></a-sky>
#>   d3
#>   4.4.1
#>   /Users/jcoe/Documents/Packages/ascatter/inst/d3
#>   d3.min.js
#>   TRUE
#>   ascatter
#>   0.0.1
#>   /Users/jcoe/Documents/Packages/ascatter/inst/ascatter
#>   a-scatterplot.min.js
#>   TRUE
#> </a-scene>
